attributes.image: TSITD Tom Helping.png'''Tom''' is a character in ''Game of Thrones: A Telltale Games Series''.==Biography =====Background======"Iron From Ice"===Tom appears in King's Landing as a coal boy wearing ratty old clothes.The only time he appears is after Mira Forrester's conversation with Margaery Tyrell telling Mira that he knows people that can help her, including himself.==="The Lost Lords"===Tom appears at the beginning of the episode delivering a letter to Mira Forrester from her mother, requiring Margaery's influence to betrothe Elaena Glenmore to Rodrik Forrester.Tom again appears at the end of the episode, hearing screaming he rushes to where Damien has nearly choked Mira to death, he hits Damien on the head which causes him to bleed and throw his intentions of killing Mira to him instead.The player can then order Mira to attack Damien with the knife, thus killing him or running away, leaving Tom toÂ drown. However, if left behind, Tom will show up at the end of the episode in the teaser for "The Sword in the Darkness", revealing that he survived.Killing Damien will have the two engage in a conversation about how Tom found her hearing screaming, he then drags Damien's body away, knowing that he can get rid of the body to where no one will be able to find the corpse.==="The Sword in the Darkness"===''TBA''==="Sons of Winter"===Tom will appear in this episode.==Appearances==Telltale Game Series Appearances

'''Tom''' is a character in ''[[Game of Thrones: A Telltale Games Series]]''.
sections.Biography:
===Background===
==="[[Iron From Ice]]"===
Tom appears in King's Landing as a coal boy wearing ratty old clothes.

The only time he appears is after [[Mira Forrester]]'s conversation with [[Margaery Tyrell]] telling Mira that he knows people that can help her, including himself.

==="[[The Lost Lords]]"===
Tom appears at the beginning of the episode delivering a letter to Mira Forrester from her mother, requiring Margaery's influence to betrothe [[Elaena Glenmore]] to [[Rodrik Forrester]].

Tom again appears at the end of the episode, hearing screaming he rushes to where [[Damien]] has nearly choked Mira to death, he hits Damien on the head which causes him to bleed and throw his intentions of killing Mira to him instead.

The player can then order Mira to attack Damien with the knife, thus killing him or running away, leaving Tom toÂ drown. However, if left behind, Tom will show up at the end of the episode in the teaser for "The Sword in the Darkness", revealing that he survived.

Killing Damien will have the two engage in a conversation about how Tom found her hearing screaming, he then drags Damien's body away, knowing that he can get rid of the body to where no one will be able to find the corpse.

==="[[The Sword in the Darkness]]"===
''TBA''

==="[[Sons of Winter]]"===
Tom will appear in this episode.
